page.title: 02PROSPECT VILLAGE
page.content: Our group did an interview to find out what people thought of Prospect Village.We interviewed mostly middle aged and elderly people.We found out that most of them thought people in the village had changed because they were not as neighbourly as they used to be.Others thought that there wasn't enough for children to do in the village and that was why they had vandalized the bus-shelter.Some people thought that there was a need for a post-office and a chemist in the village .The people we spoke to thought that there hadn't been many changes in the village,even those who had lived there a long time.Most people liked the village because of the peace and quiet and the pleasant country surroundings.Younger people would probably have a different point ELIZABETH,JACKY,JENNY,KAREN, aged 10
